name: Paddle Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Paddle Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Paddle API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Paddle API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: coupon

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users

couponType.name: couponType
couponType.description: Either product (valid for specified products or subscription plans) or checkout (valid for any checkout)
couponType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Coupon Type | 作用: Either product (valid for specified products or subscription plans) or checkout (valid for any checkout) | 默认值: checkout

productIds.name: productIds
productIds.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
productIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product Names or IDs | 作用: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

discountType.name: discountType
discountType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Discount Type | 作用: Either flat or percentage | 默认值: flat

discountAmount.name: discountAmount
discountAmount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Discount Amount % | 作用: Discount amount in percentage | 默认值: 1

currency.name: currency
currency.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account
currency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Currency | 作用: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account | 默认值: EUR

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFieldsJson.name: additionalFieldsJson
additionalFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Attributes in JSON form

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: planId (值: None) - Filter: The subscription plan ID
subscriptionId (值: None) - A specific user subscription ID
state (值: None) - Filter: The user subscription status. Returns all active, past_due, trialing and paused subscription plans if not specified.

productId.name: productId
productId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product ID | 作用: The specific product/subscription ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100 | (必填项)

updateBy.name: updateBy
updateBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update By | 作用: Either flat or percentage | 默认值: couponCode

couponCode.name: couponCode
couponCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Coupon Code | 作用: Identify the coupon to update

group.name: group
group.description: The name of the group of coupons you want to update
group.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group | 作用: The name of the group of coupons you want to update

paymentId.name: paymentId
paymentId.description: The upcoming subscription payment ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
paymentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payment Name or ID | 作用: The upcoming subscription payment ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

date.name: date
date.description: Date you want to move the payment to
date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date | 作用: Date you want to move the payment to

planId.name: planId
planId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Plan ID | 作用: Filter: The subscription plan ID | (必填项)
